content: by anastaciaknits on ravelry anastaciaknits@verizon net gauge first 5 rounds equals 3 inches finished size 6 5 inches across materials h crochet hook 100% dishcloth cotton such as lily sugar n cream approximately 20 grams pattern notes work in continuous rnds not joining each round unless otherwise stated do not turn place marker in 1st st of each round and move stitch marker up each round directions round 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 3 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next repeat around 18 single_crochet round 4 2 single_crochet in first 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat around 24 single_crochet round 5 2 single_crochet in first 1 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat around join round with a slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 30 single_crochet round 6 you will now be joining each round chain 3 1 double_crochet in ea of the next 2 single_crochet chain 1 * 1 double_crochet in next 3 single_crochet chain 1 repeat from * around join round with slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain 3 30 double_crochet 10 chain-1 space round 7 chain 3 1 double_crochet in ea of the next 2 double_crochet chain 2 * 1 double_crochet in each of the next 3 double_crochet chain 2 repeat from * around join with a slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain 3 30 double_crochet & 10 chain-2 space round 8 chain 3 1 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in chain 2 space * double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in chain-2 space repeat from * around join with slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain 3 60 double_crochet round 9 chain 1 * single_crochet in next 9 double_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next st repeat from * around slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 66 single_crochet end off weave in ends feel free to make as many of these as you like for local craft fairs/auctions/raffles/bazaars but please do not sell finished items online the pattern itself is not for sale if making for charity please let me know the name of the charity & include my contact info with the item anastaciaknits@verizon net / anastaciaknits on ravelry thanks thanks to pamelascrafts olive2 vapmore & gumby28 for their test crocheting/thoughts/editing also a big thank you goes out to the testing pool group on ravelry copyright 2008 anastaciaknits on ravelry
